title: ✦CHARMING 1Bed by Boston College avail.9/3 (Heat+Water Inc.)(NO Fee)
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 40997355', 'Rent: $2,195 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/03/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Brighton.', 'Located between Boston College and Chestnut Hill Ave.', 'Available September 3rd.', 'Features include a large eat-in kitchen, a modern bathroom, gleaming hardwood floors throughout, and laundry in building.', 'Spacious living area with natural lighting.', 'Off street parking available for rent.', 'Minutes from public transportation.', '*HEAT AND HOT WATER INCLUDED IN RENT* *NO BROKER FEE*', 'For more information or to schedule a showing please call or email Chris!', '7812281766', 'Chrisg @ <URL>', 'Click the link below to search all of my 'Laundry in Building', 'Chris Gemayel', 'Phone: 781 228 1766', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC', '107 Brighton Avenue', 'Boston, MA 02134', "Not what you're looking for?", 'Message me anyways!', 'I have access to one of the largest apartment databases in Greater Boston and would love to help with your next home search!', "Search Boston's largest selection of apartments <URL>", 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
